text: in today's world businesses are tasked
with growing revenues faster than ever
before
building new business applications to
generate new revenue streams quickly is
critical
traditionally businesses would have to
wait on it to provision servers build
the application test it and if it didn't
happen start all over again this process
could take months
what if there's a better way
there is leveraging amazon web services
building blocks you can easily develop
applications to build new revenue
streams for your business
amazon ec2 instances span across a
number of different performance levels
to support your application's
requirements
aws identity and access management
allows you to control who accesses your
applications
aws opsworks allows you to easily deploy
and manage your applications so you can
focus on what matters the most
revenue
aws brings together the services needed
to build and run your application
seamlessly
what does this mean for you
more time to focus on creating value for
your business
learn more about amazon web services
today
